00022 #ifndef SPOT_MISC_HASHFUNC_HH
00023 # define SPOT_MISC_HASHFUNC_HH
00024 # include <cstddef>
00025 
00026 namespace spot
00027 {
00031 
00036   inline size_t
00037   wang32_hash(size_t key)
00038   {
00039     // We assume that size_t has at least 32bits.
00040     key += ~(key << 15);
00041     key ^=  (key >> 10);
00042     key +=  (key << 3);
00043     key ^=  (key >> 6);
00044     key += ~(key << 11);
00045     key ^=  (key >> 16);
00046     return key;
00047   }
00048 
00055   inline size_t
00056   knuth32_hash(size_t key)
00057   {
00058     // 2654435761 is the golden ratio of 2^32.  The right shift of 3
00059     // bits assumes that all objects are aligned on a 8 byte boundary.
00060     return (key >> 3) * 2654435761U;
00061   }
00063 }
00064 
00065 #endif // SPOT_MISC_HASHFUNC_HH
